document_data.mainbody:
loryswords An Informal and Incomplete Overview of Adventuring Bands in the Year of the Spur was a book written by Ragefast the Sage of Baldurs Gate and published in 1369 DR.
Gloryswords collected the historic records of adventuring companies and their deeds during 1348 DR, the year of an influx in the vocation in the Forest Kingdom of Cormyr.
